channel.title: Paying for a PI webclient
channel.description:
Ok guys, perfectionx needs a webclient maker and will be paying. What we are looking for: a senseable person someone that can do it quick someone that we can trust someone that we can come back to that can do it for free for us in future so if we add some customs they can reupload
What we are looking for in the webclient: we want it to not be glitchy we want it to be stable we want everything to work

item.title: Paying for a PI webclient
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

[quote=“paymon, post:3, topic:369486”][quote author=Squirt Ltd link=topic=465615.msg3405034#msg3405034 date=1290266025]
Someone posted one for free in server downloads…
Also there is a tutorial for PI webclients somewhere
[/quote]

oh lol i got a cache ready my client already auto downloads[/quote]

Then all you gotta do is jar the client and change where it grabs the cache data from? I think I saw a post on someone who was doing it for free, I’ d have to try and find it again though.

Read full topic

@paymon wrote:

Ok guys, perfectionx needs a webclient maker and will be paying. What we are looking for:
a senseable person
someone that can do it quick
someone that we can trust
someone that we can come back to that can do it for free for us in future so if we add some customs they can reupload

we want it to not be glitchy
we want it to be stable
we want everything to work
